kreport.name: gzGroupMonitor

condition.name: executergroupid
condition.extend: select g.id,g.fw_name from sec_group g,sec_org o where g.org_id=o.id and (o.org_code like '0001100000030001%' or o.org_code like '00010020%') order by o.org_code

data.thead: 处理人 未签收 已签未处理 已签已处理
data.tbody: ${2} ${3} ${4} ${5}

kreport.ksql: select n.executercode 处理人ID, n.executername 处理人, sum(decode(n.status,'DT',1,0)) 未签收, sum(decode(n.status,'DB',1,0)) 已签未处理, sum(decode(n.status,'YB',1,0)) 已签已处理 from ( select f.flowlsh,n.executercode,n.executername,n.status from rec_flow f,ins_frm_fault i,rec_node n where f.flowlsh=n.flowlsh and f.flowlsh=i.flowlsh and f.status!='XJ' and f.flowcode='86b47b100a11226801c8c29cc4f3df3f' --故障流程 #[and n.executergroupid=${executergroupid}] and i.fualtstatus not in ('230','240','250') group by f.flowlsh,n.executercode,n.executername,n.status ) n group by n.executercode,n.executername order by 未签收
